title: Terros
description: He doesn't need legs where he isn't going.

body.raw: Terros is a patchwerk boss (who notably lacks legs) with a focus on dropping pillars for tanks to break with a beam mechanic, a meteor soak mechanic, and a few minor mechanics requiring us to slowly rotate around his platform. ## Mechanics Refer to [Mythic Trap ‚Äî Terros](https://www.mythictrap.com/en/vault/terros/heroic) for detailed visuals and animations of the mechanics. They have been listed here for reference. A random player is targeted with a swirling vortex meteor mechanic. It deals 961k nature damage split evenly among players within 12 yards and leaves an [Aftershock](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=386400) which erupts at the impact location a few seconds later. This goes out at the same time as [Awakened Earth](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=381486). This mechanic can be solo'd with immunities. üê¢ Several players are debuffed with [Awakened Earth](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=381486), marking them with a yellow arrow and surrounding them with a small circle. Upon expiration these spawn pillars of the same name that pulsate raid damage until destroyed. These should be placed in line with the primary tank position, or very close together but not stacked (splashing your debuff-mates), and *not in melee*. This goes out at the same time as [Rock Blast](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=380487). These players should focus on placing their pillar in the correct spot and not soaking. Killing a pillar causes [Seismic Assault](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=381576), dealing 24k damage to the entire raid and applying a DoT for 12 seconds, stacking. When Terros reaches 100 energy he casts a pizza-slice frontal which permanently covers a quarter of the platform in miasma. It deals lethal (478k nature) damage to those caught in it, destroying [Awakened Earth](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=381486) pillars in the process, and causes [Fractured Rubble](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=378861) to fall from the ceiling which deals impact damage and leaving behind miasma. Terros periodically casts [Shattering Impact](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=383073) as a large yellow circle which, if caught within, deals 252k nature damage and knocks players into the air. This mechanic also triggers [Fractured Rubble](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=378861) to fall from the ceiling. Testing suggests the mechanic targets the largest clump of players, which is typically melee due to the ranged players dealing with pillar mechanics. Terros will emit a line of energy at the active tank that deals 242k physical damage and increases damage taken by 30% for 45 seconds, stacking. [Concussive Slam](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=376279) will destroy any [Awakened Earth](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=381486) pillars in the path of the beam. In the same spirit as Halondrus, the beam is used to break pillars. If the entire platform is filled with [Resonant Aftermath](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=382458) puddles then Terros enrages, casting [Frenzied Devastation](https://www.wowhad.com/spell=377505) repeatedly until our faces are melted off. If no player is within the bosses range he will cast [Tectonic Barrage](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=388393) repeatedly. ## Heroic Strategy This normal and heroic strategy is outdated. Everyone stacks in melee and all pillars go right-ish so they're all broken at the same time from now on. Positioning matters but isn't the key to this fight. The boss periodically drops rocks that spawn miasma on the platform which would complicate rigid position assignments. Ensuring pillars are in a cohesive line for tanks to break is the only real requirement. The fight is based around a triangular formation for the ranged players. Ranged players will stack at . Melee and the off-tank should always be to the left of the current tank to avoid the [Concussive Slam](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=376279) beam. 1. Players debuffed with [Rock Blast](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=380487) move to . The ranged and melee groups will dip into the outer edge of the circle to help soak. 2. Players debuffed with [Awakened Earth](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=381486) move to and spread their circles in a line so the tank's beam mechanic can hit them all in one go. At 100 energy when the boss casts [Resonating Annihilation](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=377166) the group will gateway out of the pizza slice. There are various similar abilities such as [Fractured Rubble](https://www.wowhead.com/spell=378861) which can also disrupt the group's positioning. Regardless, after movement the groups should best recreate the general positions they were in before, absent the markers. Think of the movement like Skolex, and the pillars and tank beam like Halondrus. ## Video
